name: HoloFuel
description: Simple and intuitive interface allowing users to transact with HoloFuel.

scripts.start-dna-agent2: cd ./holofuel && HC_N3H_BOOTSTRAP_NODE=wss://192.168.0.7:40297/?a=hkb2XZPgAa4cnrVSmXQ3MjVFr7mk-u4dWvcJDjxqT_g8doUdQTzEAuQk-6t3h-M7XVkF4UZy7mYTBMsEuTCvLV5q2fpmiMEc HC_N3H_IPC_URI=wss://127.0.0.1:35321/ HC_N3H_PATH=/home/lisa/n3h HC_AGENT=testAgent2 hc run --port 3100
